scripts.build:club: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/club
scripts.build:platform: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/platform
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/club && npm run build --workspace=apps/platform
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:club && npm run type-check:platform
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules shared/node_modules apps/*/.next shared/.next
